Pagination

Pagination is a simple component that control the pages.



Basic Setup

Use a class name ".pagination" and you are good to go. Additional helper classes for better control such as class name's ".active" (to highlight the link), ".inactive" (to make it inactive), and classes ".prev" and ".next" to easily access the pages.


  • « prev
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • ...
  • 11
  • 12
  • next »


HTML example markup
<ul class="pagination">
	<li class="inactive prev"><a href="#" >« prev</a></li>
	<li>><a href="#">1</a></li>
	<li><a href="#">2</a></li>
	<li class="active"><a href="#">3</a></li>
	<li><a href="#">...</a></li>
	<li><a href="#">11</a></li>
	<li><a href="#">12</a></li>
	<li class="next"><a href="#">next »</a></li>
</ul>
Important!

For anvanced styling regarding to arrows (next and prev), use Font Awesome or any other images. Use class name's ".prev" and ".next" for further styling.



Pagination Alignment

Most paginations are aligned center. To make your pagination centered, add a class name ".center" to the class name ".pagination. We also added right aligned ".right, just in case. Default is aligned left.


  • « prev
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • ...
  • 11
  • 12
  • next »
  • « prev
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • ...
  • 11
  • 12
  • next »
  • « prev
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • ...
  • 11
  • 12
  • next »


HTML example markup
<ul class="pagination center">
	<li class="inactive prev"><a href="#" >« prev</a></li>
	<li>><a href="#">1</a></li>
	<li><a href="#">2</a></li>
	<li class="active"><a href="#">3</a></li>
	<li><a href="#">...</a></li>
	<li><a href="#">11</a></li>
	<li><a href="#">12</a></li>
	<li class="next"><a href="#">next »</a></li>
</ul>


// Pagination Basic Styling
$pagination-color: $color-default !default;
$pagination-font-size: 14px !default;
$pagination-margin-bottom: 10px !default;

// Paginatin List
// Pagination List - Margin Styling
$pagination-list-margin-bottom: 5px !default;
$pagination-list-margin-right: 2px !default;

// Pagination Link
// Pagination Link - Basic Styling
$pagination-link-bg: $color-secondary !default;	
$pagination-link-color: $color-white !default;
$pagination-link-padding: 10px 15px 10px 15px !default; // top, right, bottom, left.

// Pagination Link - Hover
$pagination-link-bg-hover: $color-primary !default;	
$pagination-link-color-hover: $color-white !default;

// Pagination Link - Active
$pagination-link-bg-active: $pagination-link-bg-hover !default;	
$pagination-link-color-active: $pagination-link-color-hover !default;

See config.scss for complete reference.
